name: max-repel
effect: Used outside of battle : Trainer will skip encounters with wild Pokémon of a lower level than the lead party Pokémon. This effect wears off after the trainer takes 250 steps.
short_effect: For 250 steps, prevents wild encounters of level lower than your party’s lead Pokémon.

flavor_text.diamond-pearl: An item that prevents weak wild Pokémon from appearing for 250 steps after its use.
flavor_text.platinum: An item that prevents weak wild Pokémon from appearing for 250 steps after its use.
flavor_text.heartgold-soulsilver: An item that prevents weak wild Pokémon from appearing for 250 steps after its use.
